attributes.action: Keep hospital parking free for all NHS staff
attributes.additional_details:
The NHS are our lifeline. The work they do is incredible. At the very least we can abolish parking fees to eliminate extra financial pressure faced on workers and an institution already under strain. 

MPs have the luxury of free parking. Our healthcare heros don’t. End the parking charges and support our workers 

Scotland and Wales have free parking for NHS, staff, let’s make sure we do to
attributes.background: We urge the government to keep hospital parking free for all NHS workers. NHS staff should not be made to pay more for simply turning up to work,  where they bravely put themselves at risk and save our lives

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612699
